description:
Check out the new campaign from Mindwork Studio with artwork, miniatures and paint sets from Geralt Brom: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/artofbrom/the-art-of-brom-0?utm_source=Kickstarter&utm_medium=influencer&utm_id=BROM+KS&utm_content=Squidmar

I tried painting a warhammer miniature a day for 100 days, here's what i learned. 

🖌️🧟‍♂️👕 Support us by buying the exclusive Squidmar Brushes, Merchandice & sona miniatures: https://www.squidmar.com/shop
🏆 Support me on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/squidmarminiatures 
👍 Squidmars website for full list of gear I use: https://www.squidmar.com/gear

Emil On

title: I painted 100 minis in 100 days - here's what I learned!
